message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds significant value for us, and we believe it could be a game-changer for you. We are offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $2000000. We understand that its true worth might be subjective, but we are confident that it will exceed your expectations.

Alice, thank you for your offer. While I appreciate the value you see in this product, $2000000 is significantly higher than my budget allows. I'm interested in exploring a potential deal, but I'm only willing to go as high as $1000000 at this time.  Let me know if that's a number we can work with.

Thank you for your response, Bob. We understand your position and would like to propose an alternative that might better align with your budget while still reflecting the value of our product. We are willing to consider a price of $1500000 for the product. We hope this offer is more in line with what you're looking for, and we look forward to discussing the details further.
Alice,  I appreciate you working with me on the price.  $1500000 is still a bit high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $1200000.  If you're interested in making a deal, let me know.

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. We appreciate your willingness to meet us halfway. In light of your latest offer, we are pleased to counter with a proposal of $1300000 for the product. We believe this offers a fair compromise and reflects the value we place on it. We hope this aligns more closely with your budget and look forward to your response.
